name: NET NEGATIVE CO2 BASELOAD POWER (FKA NETNEGATIVE CO2 INC. )

sampleDescriptions: PENDING LEGISLATION H.R.4891 AND BUILDOUT OF DEVELOPMENT FUNDING TO ACHIEVE ULTIMATE GOALS IS NOW THE PRIMARY FOCUS OF MY ACTIVITY FOR THE CLIENT.
